remarks: Deduction version of ~ strfv .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)
statement:
strfv2d.e $e |- E = Slot ( E ` ndx ) $.
strfv2d.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
strfv2d.f $e |- ( ph -> Fun `' `' S ) $.
strfv2d.n $e |- ( ph -> <. ( E ` ndx ) , C >. e. S ) $.
strfv2d.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. W ) $.
strfv2d $p |- ( ph -> C = ( E ` S ) ) $.
